name: Undead Knights (itch)
description:
Game wont load? Make sure 3rd party cookies are enabled.

Game sound works best on Chrome.

You are a knight roaming through the Crumbling Castle to find the goblet before it is destroyed forever! Use arrow keys to move, and z to slash.

Click escape and go to gamepad config to change controls.

Keep in mind - the damage system works on ticks, so if you are standing in an enemy for the ticks that it does damage, it will damage you, it will not damage you for the first frame that you are inside of the enemy.
